mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from amall_user
order by ${orderByClause}
select T3.* from amall_user T1 left join amall_user_role T2 on T1.id=T2.user_id left join amall_role T3 on T2.role_id=T3.id where T1.id=#{id}

select
distinct
from amall_user
order by ${orderByClause}
